@PublicAPI(stability=PRIVATE)

Package org.opends.server.replication.service

This package contains the generic of the Multi-Master replication code that works on the Directory Server side.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CTHeartbeatPublisherThread
    This thread publishes a heartbeat message on a given protocol session at regular intervals when there are no other replication messages being published.
    ListenerThread
    Thread that is used to get messages from the Replication servers and replay them in the current server.
    ReplicationBroker
    The broker for Multi-master Replication.
    ReplicationBroker.ReplicationServerInfo
    Bag class for keeping info we get from a replication server in order to compute the best one to connect to.
    ReplicationDomain
    This class should be used as a base for Replication implementations.
    ReplicationMonitor
    Class used to generate monitoring information for the replication.
    ReplInputStream
    This class creates an input stream that can be used to read entries generated by SynchroLDIF as if they were being read from another source like a file.
    ReplOutputStream
    This class creates an output stream that can be used to export entries to a synchronization domain.

Package org.opends.server.replication.service Description

This package contains the generic of the Multi-Master replication code that works on the Directory Server side.
Developers planning to use the Replication Service should subClass the HREF="ReplicationDomain.html">ReplicationDomain class
